app.models.engine package¶

Submodules¶

app.models.engine.storage module¶

Contains the class Storage

class app.models.engine.storage.Storage¶

Bases: object

Storage Class, this object controls all the comunication with the database

classmethod add_to_dict(objs_dict, objs)¶

This method add to the dictionary dic, all the objects in list objs with formated like key. The key’s format is ‘<Class>.<id>’

all(cls=None, **kwargs)¶

Method to return all instances from database of a given class or all instances from all classes kwargs must be None or specific columns and values respectively

all_inclusive(cls=None, **kwargs)¶

Method to return all instances from database of a given class or all instances from all classes kwargs must be a dictionary with only one key and an array of values as value

all_logged_users()¶

Return all users with user_name and password different than Null

clear_all()¶

Delete all tables in database

close()¶

call remove() method on the private session attribute

delete(obj=None)¶

delete from the current database session obj if not None

delete_users()¶

Delete all users, hence all data

dummy_database()¶
new(obj)¶

add the object to the current database session

one(cls=None, **kwargs)¶

Method to return first instance from database of a given class that fulfills kwargs filters kwargs must be None or specific columns and values respectively

order_by_dates(d0, d1)¶

Return query of orders between date0 and date1 the dates format must be %d-%m-%Y

reload()¶

reloads data from the database

rollback()¶

rollback session

save()¶

commit all changes of the current database session
